name: Car4Coins
description:
Made in 2 days for the Vimlark GameJam

Hard car game where you need to collect the coins and get to the end of a randomized map. Use up and down to go forward and backwards and tilt with right and left. Collect as many coins as possible. Works better when installed.

Car made by Wabble at  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u6SiHi0HBxU&feature=youtu.be

PS. Thanks Vimlark for teaching me about Aphantasia because I found out  have it.
